---
title: "Create a CSS file from a code chunk"
output: 
  html_document:
    css: custom.css
---

The chunk below will be written to `custom.css`, which
will be used during the Pandoc conversion.

```{cat, engine.opts = list(file = "custom.css")}
h2 {
  color: blue;
}
```

## And this title will blue
